modal_p.en: I enjoy developing web apps using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React C and PHP. I have about 3 years professional experience as a technical project manager.

My lifelong passion is to help everyone, regardless of their background or upbringing, live the life they want.
From my personal experiences in childhood, I firmly believe that education is key to achieving this goal for society.
While technology has the potential to deliver education universally, the current digital environment often falls short of being inclusive to all.
I aspire to become a professional developer to contribute to create inclusive digital products, especially those related to education, so that everyone can benefit from the technology.

I often bake breadğŸ¥, cookiesğŸª, and pizzağŸ•, and everything always turns out great (believe it or not, haha).
I am a traveler, having lived in three countries (the UK, the US, and Japan), stayed in two countries (Nepal and Indonesia for one month each), and visited 20 countries,
from the sunny summer resort MaldivesğŸ–ï¸ (my favorite!) to the snowy Christmas markets in Germanyâ˜ƒï¸.
I love experiencing new cultures, languages and, most importantly, foodsğŸ˜‹
As you might see in my favorite tracks on the home page, I am really into K(orean)-pop and J(apanese)-pop, especially female idolsğŸ‘¯â€â™€ï¸ğŸª©
